dict.acceptation: 沐浴；洗澡；浴缸，澡盆；浸，泡，洗澡水；

sent.orig: BATH first comprehensive strength in the first-class university, there are very good standard of teaching.
sent.trans: 首先BATH大学综合实力中上等，有很不错的教学水平。

sent.orig: Bath, Bedding, Luxury Bed, Bath and Table Linens, Baby Bedding. Bath, Luxury Bed.
sent.trans: 采购产品沭浴，被褥，奢侈床，沭浴和桌布，婴儿被褥。沭浴，奢侈床。

sent.orig: Shower bath, tub bath and surf bath.
sent.trans: 设有冲淋卫浴、浴缸卫浴、冲浪卫浴。

sent.orig: Do sub-steaming, wet steam, rain bath, mist bath, bath, such as a hail of bullets.
sent.trans: 分干蒸、湿蒸、雨浴、雾浴、枪林弹雨浴等。

sent.orig: To point out the advantages of water bath heat-treatment by contrast with lead bath heat-treatment.
sent.trans: 与铅浴热处理进行了对比分析，指出水浴热处理的优点。
